plot: Del is having health problems - stomach aches - and the usual cash flow problem, so, to raise money, he organizes a series of séances run by Albert's psychic friend Elsie, who correctly predicts Marlene's pregnancy. When Elsie tells him his mother wants him to go to the doctor about his pains Del reluctantly agrees and ultimately finds he has Irritable Bowel Syndrome, which is not life threatening but requires a very strict health food diet. This is not really to his liking but a bigger shock comes when Rodney tells him he and Cassandra are getting married.—don @ minifie-1

Del is suffering not only financially, but with stomach cramps too - and things are starting to look a bit bleak for the Trotters. Uncle Albert feels their misfortune may be down to negative supernatural forces in their flat, and that they might be haunted. But help is at hand with his friend, Elsie Partridge, who claims to be a spiritualist. Del, however, once more has pound signs in his eyes when he learns of Elsie's paranormal powers...—stevecann2003
